original_text: Neither gold nor beautiful glass is as valuable as wisdom. A whole pot full of gold could not buy it. Neither gold nor beautiful glass is as valuable as wisdom.
korean_text: 황금이나 수정이라도 비교할 수 없고 정금 장식품으로도 바꿀 수 없으며

sentences.original_text: Neither gold is as valuable as wisdom.
Nor beautiful glass is as valuable as wisdom.
sentences.korean_translation: 아름다운 유리도 지혜만큼 가치가 있지 않다.

sentences.original_text: A whole pot full of gold could not buy it.
sentences.korean_translation: 가득 찬 금 솥도 그것을 살 수 없다.

sentences.original_text: Neither gold is as valuable as wisdom.
Nor beautiful glass is as valuable as wisdom.
sentences.korean_translation: 아름다운 유리도 지혜만큼 가치가 있지 않다.
